first_utt: I've been working at my same job for 12 years.
target_utt: Yes I love it
middle_utt: What do you do for a living?  I've only been at my current job for a little over a year.
I work in an office. It's boring, but it pays the bills. What about you?
I work at a bank.  It's not boring at all.  I love my job.
That's great! I'm glad you love your job. I hope I can find a job that I love.
I hope you do too.  What kind of work do you like?  Do you have any hobbies?
gold_utt: Wow. That's quite the feat nowadays. Do you still enjoy it?
Yes I do.  Its a fun job.
Is it a "never worked a day in your life" situation?
Yes I am a skydiving instructor so it is fun
Oh wow, yes I would imagine that is fun. I am jealous.

first_utt: I'm happily married and employed, life is in a pretty good spot right now.
target_utt: It is always awesome when work and married life get along, without getting in the way of each other.
middle_utt: That's great to hear. I'm happy for you. I wish I could say the same.
Thanks, I am sure you will find someone that makes you happy and you will be just fine.
I sure hope so. I've been single for a long time. I think I'm ready to settle down.
That is great, I wish you the best of luck. I know it can be hard to find the right person.
gold_utt: That is awesome, having a significant other and a good job can make a huge difference!
For sure. I've had some unstable times in my life. I'm thankful to be where I am now.
Those times can help shape you and make you appreciate the good times even more!
Absolutely!

first_utt: Yesterday my car ran out of oil and broke down. I could not believe I would let such a thing happen!
target_utt: It does drops a lot after a repair like that. I might as well invest that money into something new.
middle_utt: Oh no! That's terrible! I hope you can get it fixed soon.
Thank you! I am going to have to wait until I can get a new one. I am so upset about it.
I'm sorry to hear that. Hopefully it won't be too expensive to get a replacement.
I hope so too. I have been saving up for a new car for a while now.
That's a good idea. I'm sure you'll be able to save a lot of money that way.
gold_utt: Oh no! Did it do any meaningful damage?
The engine is totally shot, its not designed to run without any. So now I have to go shopping for a new car.
OUCH. New car is cheaper than replacing the engine?
The new car is more expensive than a new engine. But I can't justify such a costly repair on my car.
Yeah I get that. Plus I guess the value goes way down doing something like that.

first_utt: I was in a big party city and the street was crowded with people. As I was walking my foot got tangled up on something and I went face first into a huge flower bed.
target_utt: That's what I was thinking.
middle_utt: Oh no! Did you get hurt? I hope you were okay. I hate when that happens.
I was fine, but I was so embarrassed. I had to go to the ER to get stitches.
I'm glad you're okay. That must have been so embarrassing. I would have been too.
Thank you. It was embarrassing, but at least I didn't have to pay for it.
gold_utt: Ouch! That must have hurt.
It hurt my pride more than it hurt my face.
Don't worry, people won't remember within a few months.
That is true. Plus it was a big party area so Im sure a lot of them drunk anyway.

first_utt: I have a friend with loaded parents. She doesn't work but has anything she wants anytime she wants.
target_utt: I often dream about winning the lottery!
middle_utt: That would be awesome! I would love to win the lotto too. I think it would change my life for the better.
I think so too! It would be nice to be able to retire early and not have to worry about bills.
I agree! I think I would be happy with a small amount of money. I don't want to be a millionaire.
I think that's a good idea. I would want to have enough money to live a comfortable life without worrying about money.
gold_utt: Wow, must be nice. My parents were really poor- still are.
Mine aren't poor but they aren't loaded. They struggle. Same for me. I work my butt of for what I have.
Yeah me too. I like that though, I like earning my way.
Same. I do wish I had a little bit more money to do a few more things though.

first_utt: I had to do a lot of learning to knock out a big project at work. Finally finished and ready for another.
target_utt: It always feels good to wrap up a big project.
middle_utt: That's always a good feeling. What was the project about? I hope it went well.
It was about a new technology that we are developing. It went well, but it was a long and tedious process.
I bet it was. I'm glad you were able to get it done though. It's always nice to have a project to work on.
Yes, it is. I am glad I was able to do it. I was very proud of myself.
gold_utt: Hey, good for you! That takes stamina. What was the project?
For sure. It was a software coding project for a client. A lot of which I did not understand at the start.
Well done! That was a challenge.
Thank you. But now I have it ready for the next one.

first_utt: I have been working on at the track to get my sprint times faster1
target_utt: I think you can get better dude!
middle_utt: I hope so. I'm not looking forward to going back to the gym. I hate being so weak.
I know how you feel, but you can do it! I believe in you!
Thank you. I appreciate it. I need to get back to it.  Do you have any hobbies?
I like to play video games and watch movies. What about you? What do you like to do?
gold_utt: Wow that's awesome! Are you on a team?
No, just me, but my 100 yard dash is so so slow, I can't even get lower than 6 seconds.
I don't know what's good for sprints, I'm more of a distance runner myself.
I think I'm just really bad, maybe I will always be slow.

first_utt: I recently remembered a sweet memory of my aunt who recently passed away.
target_utt: that's pretty cool of you. i hope to have a daughter like you someday
middle_utt: I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you have a good memory of her to remember her by.
Thank you. I do. She was a wonderful woman. I miss her dearly.
I'm sure she is in a better place now. I'm glad you have good memories of her.
Thank you so much. That means a lot to me. It's been a long time since I've spoken to her.
gold_utt: what was it?
She would give hundreds of dollars of school supplies to kids in need each year.
wow, that's an amazing woman. did she rub off on you any?
She did! I fill stockings around the holidays and go around on Christmas giving them out to people who have to work. :)

first_utt: My mother in law was recently placed in hospice and is not expected to live much longer.
target_utt: yep she's want you to remember that, even if she can't remember it herself
middle_utt: I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope she has a great life ahead of her.
Thank you, I hope so too. She's a great person and I know she'll be in a better place soon.
I'm sure she will. I wish you and your family the best of luck!
Thank you so much, I appreciate it.  I hope you have a great day.
gold_utt: oh man. it's always tough to lose a parent. how old is she?
She's 87, so she has lived a long life, but she has Alzheimers, and it's really sad to watch her lose her mind.
yeah i bet. at least you got to know her for as long as you did
That's a great way of looking at it. I should try to keep a positive attitude towards it.

first_utt: A hurricane hit my city. The first night I thought the wind was going to tear the roof off the house
target_utt: In the end, I'd rather be  in a hurricane than a snow storm.  lol
middle_utt: Oh no! I'm glad you're okay! I've been through a few hurricanes and they can be scary!
Yeah, it was pretty scary.  I live in Florida, so we get a lot of storms.
I'm in Florida too! I live near the Gulf of Mexico. We get a ton of rain and floods.
Oh wow, that's a lot!  I've never been to the gulf of mexico, but I hear it's beautiful!
gold_utt: Oh no! Hurricanes are scary.  I've been through a few myself.  Was it your first one?
It was my third. Luckily we didn't lose power for more than a few hours
I lost power in our last hurricane for 3 days.  Did the wind do any damage to your home?
It damaged the roof and the fence. We lost power for six days during the first hurricane I experienced

first_utt: I bought a 20 foot boat. I believe it will be able to handle the large lake that I will be taking it on.
target_utt: I hope you do! It makes you feel like you've actually earned it!
middle_utt: That sounds like a lot of fun. I hope it works out well for you. I'm sure it will.
Thank you! I hope so, too. I've been working hard to get it.
That's great. I wish you the best of luck.  I hope everything goes well.
Thank you so much! I appreciate it. I really hope it does too. It would be nice to have something to do on the lake.
Yes, it would.  It's always nice to get out and enjoy the outdoors.
It really is. I love being out in nature. It's one of my favorite things to do.
gold_utt: Wow! A 20 foot boat, that must be amazing to take out on the lake! How much did it cost you?
It cost me around $30,000. It has all the latest features, that should keep me safe in all but the most extreme conditions.
Id love to own a boat, are you using it for leisure or fishing etc?
It has been a dream of mine for a long time. I am mainly going to use it for fishing. But might have to take my wife tubing to make her happy.
They both sound like great plans! Tubing would be a great way to keep her happy while you fish haha!
We should have a lot of fun this summer with it! Makes up for all the hard work saving up for it.

first_utt: I let my friend babysit my kid last week.
target_utt: Just barely older than my son. I can definitely understand that.
middle_utt: That's nice of you.  How old is your son?  I'm sure he appreciates it.
He's 10.  He's a good kid.  I just wish I had more time to spend with him.
I know what you mean.  It's hard to find the time with kids these days.
It really is.  My son is a handful.  But I love him to death.
gold_utt: How did they do?
Awesome. I usually have a hard time letting anyone watch my child but he had a great time with her.
How old's your child?

first_utt: Even though I could've gotten more money at another job, I've stayed with my current employer. It is a good place to work.
target_utt: I always need convincing to take my yucky medicine
middle_utt: That's good to hear. What kind of work do you do now? I hope it's not too stressful.
I work in a call center. It isn't too bad, but I do miss my old job.
That's too bad. I'm sure you'll find a new job soon. I hope.
I hope so, too. It's been a long time since I've had a job.
gold_utt: well that's good to hear I guess. what do you do?
I work in public relations. I create campaigns for companies.
what's your most successful campaign so far?
I recently did a very successful one for a medical company.

first_utt: My wife made me pancakes for breakfast. I have a full belly and feel rather happy now.
target_utt: I bet she is a great cook!
middle_utt: She is! I'm so thankful for her. She makes me so happy. I love her so much.
I am so happy for you! I hope you have many more happy years together!
Thank you so much! I appreciate that. I hope the same for you as well.
I hope so too! I have been with my wife for 10 years now. We have been through a lot together.
That's great! I wish you guys the best of luck!.. I'm sure you guys will be happy for a long time.
Thank you very much. I am sure we will be. I know she is the one for me.
gold_utt: Yum!!! I love pancakes. Is it your favorite food too?
One of my favorite breakfast foods. She also made some thick sliced bacon. She treats me so well.
That is great you have a sweet wife!
For sure, no other woman I would rather have.
It is so great to hear about a happy couple :)
How can I complain when she gets up early to make me such a great meal!

first_utt: I saw my neighbor bought the car I have always wanted. I wish I was in a a better financial position to buy one.
target_utt: LOL, well there is always luck!
middle_utt: I know, right?  I was so excited when I saw it.  I think I'm going to go buy one now.
I hope you get it! I'm sure it will be a great car.  What kind of car is it?
It's a Toyota Corolla.  It's the first car I've ever owned and I love it!
That's great!  I'm glad you like it so much!  What do you like about it?
I love the interior.  The interior is so nice.  Everything is so spacious.
That's awesome!  Do you have any hobbies that you like to do in your spare time?
gold_utt: What kind of car is it?
Subaru Brat, best car ever made. Its like a car and a t ruck all in one.
ooh nice! just start to SAVE, SAVE,SAVE where ever you can and you will get there.
I know, it would look perfect in front of my double wide mobile home! There is a used one on the corner for $350. But that will take me months to save up.
Time goes by so fast. You'll see.
Yeah, or I could buy more scratch offs at the gas station and hit it big.

first_utt: My and some old friends from college recently got together. It's always great to see those guys again.
target_utt: Thats so awesome! I hope you all had a ton of fun!
middle_utt: We did, it was a lot of fun. I'm glad I got to see them.
That's great! I bet you had a great time. I wish I could go back to college.
It was a blast! I'm sure you'll be able to go back someday.
I sure hope so! I've got a good job now, so I can afford it.
gold_utt: I bet it is! I love getting together with friends, especially if it has been a while...which it seems to be the older I get.
Same. And all these guys live in different places now so it's harder and harder to get everyone together.
I bet it would be tough.  Was there a special occasion that brought you all together?
No. We've had a group text going for several years so we just all decided it had been too long.

first_utt: This weekend I saw one woman being kind of mean to another woman of color.
target_utt: Thats really annoying. It would be great if people would just let other people be.
middle_utt: That is so annoying.  I hate when people do that.  Did you say anything to her?
No, I didn't want to make a scene out of it. I was just so annoyed.
I would have said something to her.  It is not nice to be treated that way.
I did, but she didn't seem to care. I think she was just being rude.
gold_utt: Yikes, that doesnt happen too often in today's culture.  Did you say anything?
No kidding! I don't see how those kind of people are still around. No. It had already escalated by the time I saw it. We figured it was best to just keep moving.
That might be for the best.  Were they arguing about her color or something else?
No. She just thought the other woman wasnt doing her job. Classic sense of entitlement.

first_utt: I put in to get a promotion at work, and I should know something either way by tomorrow.
target_utt: Well I really hope you get it. You're right, you did what you could.
middle_utt: I hope so too.  I have been working really hard and I think I deserve it.
You definitely do. I'm sure you'll get it!  I'm rooting for you!
Thank you so much! I really appreciate it. I hope I get it too. I really need it.
You're welcome. I know you will get it if you put in the work. I believe in you!
gold_utt: Wow, that's really exciting! Good for you, you must be nervous.
On the one hand, I am but on the other hand I have to relax knowing I did everything I could do and worked as hard as I could.  It's kinda out of my hands now.
That's great, what kind of work are you in?
I work for a medical supply company.

first_utt: But yeah - school started for the kids today and it was weird how quiet it was once the bus pulled away.
target_utt: It's good to stop and appreciate teh moment sometimes.
middle_utt: Yeah, it was pretty quiet.  I think it was because it was the first day of school.
Yeah, I think so too.  It's weird to think that it's been so long since I was a kid.
I know, right?  I feel like I've been out of school for so long.
Yeah, me too. It's been a long time since I went back to school. I'm glad I'm done with it.
gold_utt: Oh, but I bet you appreciated it! Summer can get long.

It can.  But we had fun!  Visited lots of relatives, cooked lots of stuff, goofed off and watched more anime than is probably humanly possible...a part of me is enjoying the quiet but on the other hand, I miss having my kids around to do stuff with.
Oh, that does sound like a fun summer. I read recently that we only get 18 summers with our kids- make them count.
Yep - and I have two left with the older one.  They do grow up so fast!

first_utt: They arrested 9 people at a nearby farm for animal cruelty and they are already out of jail on bond!
target_utt: They should- they say people who hurt animals will hurt people too.
middle_utt: That's terrible! I hope they get caught soon. I don't understand how people can be so cruel to animals.
I know, right?  It's so sad.  I'm glad I live in a place where I can just go to the animal shelter and get a new puppy!
That's great! I wish more people would adopt animals. It's such a great way to help animals.
I agree!  I wish I could adopt all of the animals!  It would be so nice to help them all.  Do you have any pets?
I do! I have a dog and a cat. They're both rescues. I love them so much!
That's awesome.  I've always wanted a dog, but I live in an apartment so I can't have one.
gold_utt: Oh, that's not right. I have a rescue dog, she had a litter of puppies at a puppy mill before she was a year.

Wow!  It makes me sad how people can be so cruel to animals that don't have the ability to fight back.  The rescue shelters here have been working overtime to get things straightened out at that farm.
I could chat with you all day! We have a lot in common- I feel the same way. Keep chatting? Poor rescue animals.
Yeah.  But I'm glad at least here we have enough agencies [and people volunteering their time] that hopefully, those animals can find good care and good homes.
That's great! So sad for those poor animals.
And in my opinion, the bond for those people was nowhere near high enough - they should have had to stay in jail!

first_utt: I'm so glad the kids went back to school today!
target_utt: Enjoy them now!  Mine are 17, 15, and 10 and too cool for *everything*.  LOL
middle_utt: I know, right?  I am so glad they are back in school.  I miss them being little.
Me too!  I can't wait for them to be in school!  It's going to be so much fun!
I know!  They are going to love it!  What are you going to do when they go back?
I'm going to take them to the beach and have a picnic.  They love that!
That sounds like a lot of fun.  Have you ever been to a beach before?
gold_utt: You must be relieved! You excited for free time?
Yes!  I can go back to having ice cream for breakfast!  I can watch Law and Order all I want to without the, "Mom, you always watch this!" comment!
That sounds seriously like a dream. I cannot wait until mine are old enough to start school.
How old are they?
4 and 1. I have a bit to go haha.

first_utt: I was at the park today and almost stepped on a rattle snake. I almost jumped out of my skin.
target_utt: For sure, wouldn't want to relive that experience
middle_utt: Oh no! I hate snakes! I would have been terrified! Did it bite you?
No, thankfully it didn't. It was a garter snake, so it wasn't venomous.
That's good! I'm glad it didn;t bite you. I would be so scared!
Me too! I don't like snakes at all. I was so scared.  Do you have any pets?
No, but I would love to have a cat. I love cats. I think they're so cute and cuddly.
gold_utt: That sounds terrifying, so glad you did not step on it
Me too, that would of wrecked my day. It was so close! It haunts my thoughts even now.
I can imagine I would have nightmares about that
It might take me a little while to get over my fear and go back to the park.
And be watchful when you do!

first_utt: I really do miss my mother. She has been dead for about 15 years now.
target_utt: Yes, it does.
middle_utt: I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope you are able to cope with it.
Thank you. I am trying my best. I have a lot of support from friends and family.
That's good to hear. I'm glad you have a support system in place. It's always good to have people to lean on.
It really is. It helps to have someone to talk to. I don't know what I would do without my mom.
gold_utt: I'm very sorry for your loss. Thinking about and remember all of your good memories with her may help.
It is a blessing and curse. When I am having problems I think about what she would say to me.
That's a good way to remember her and keep her close to your heart.
Yes, it is. I know that time heals.

first_utt: I get to go to the park today for a BBQ with friends, it should be so much fun!
target_utt: Yeah, I haven't seen my friends in forever. We don't even live in the same state anymore.
middle_utt: That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope you guys have a great time. I'm jealous.
Thanks, I hope so too! I'm really looking forward to it. I hope it's as good as I think it will be.
I'm sure it will. I love BBQ. What kind of BBQ are you going to have?
It's going to be a brisket. I've never had it before, so I'm excited to try it.
gold_utt: Ooh nice. That does sound like alot of fun. Do you guys play any sport while your there?
We often throw around a frisbee for a little bit, but we never get too intense with any sports.
Cool. Well enjoy, I hope the weather hold up.
Me too, there has been a lot of rain lately. It should be fun hanging out with old friends!

first_utt: Next week I am off work and going to the beach.
target_utt: Yea, once I vacationed on a Caribbean island, Lovely beaches, food and drinks.
middle_utt: That sounds like a lot of fun. I love the beaches. Where did you go?
I went to Panama City Beach, Florida.  It was so nice and relaxing.
I've never been there. I bet it was nice. I've been to the Gulf of Mexico. It's beautiful.
I have never been that far south.  Have you ever been to Miami?  It is the most populous city in the state of Florida.
gold_utt: That is wonderful! So you will be on a vacation? Will you be going alone?
No I am going with my wife and her family. But we all get along great so it should be fun.
You will be having fun in the sun. Nothing like a day at beach.
Amen. It is much needed. Ready for some sun and a drink with an umbrella.

first_utt: Budget is kind of tight lately and I am really afraid my wife's aging car is about to bite the dust.
target_utt: I pray and hope that something works out and that the good old faithful car will not bite the dust.
middle_utt: Oh no!  I hope it doesn't.  Is there anything you can do to prevent it?
I am going to have to get a new car.  I am not sure what to do.
I'm sorry to hear that.  What kind of car are you looking at?  I'm sure you'll find something that will work.
I am looking at a Toyota Corolla.  They seem to last forever.
gold_utt: Oh dear. I am so sorry to hear. It is possible for you to get a second job?
I may have to if that happens. We are making it now, but if the car goes it will be pretty tough.
i can just imagine. I wish There was something that I could do to help.
It is ok. We are probably too proud to take help anyway. We will make it.

first_utt: I woke up the other morning, got ready and drove all the way to work. Just to find out it was a holiday and we had the day off.
target_utt: That's awesome. Days off are the best!!
middle_utt: I know right! I was so happy to get it off. I'm so ready to go back to work tomorrow.
I know, right? It's so nice to have a day off and not have to do anything.
I know! I'm looking forward to it. I've got a lot of work to do.
Me too. I have to get up early tomorrow to go to work, but I'm ready to just relax.
gold_utt: Oh man that sucks. I'm so sorry because you could have slept in lol
I know, but the extra day of work was nice. Especially since I wasn't expecting it.
See there's always a bright side. You got a surprise day off from work!!!
It was wonderful. I ended up being twice as productive since I got up early.

first_utt: I recently started learning to propagate my tomato plants by planting clipped off branches.
target_utt: Good for you!
middle_utt: That's great! Tomatoes are so versatile, you can use them in so many different ways.
I know, right?  I can even grow them in my backyard!  It's so much fun!
That's so cool! You can grow so many fruits and vegetables in your garden.
I know!  I love tomatoes!  They're so tasty!  Do you have a garden?
gold_utt: Sounds cool.
Yea, i put them in a glass of water for a week or two and they grow their own roots, wasn't expecting much.
Do you cook a lot with tomatoes
I do yes! and since the method i used is working, i have tons of tomatoes!

first_utt: I had a video job interview. That was a new experience.
target_utt: Great. And you're very welcome. I enjoy praying for other people.
middle_utt: That's great! I hope you get the job. I'm sure you'll do great!
Thank you. I hope so too. I really need the money. I've been looking for a job for a long time.
I know how you feel. It can be hard to find a job these days. I wish you the best of luck!
Thank you so much! I really appreciate it. I'll need all the luck I can get.
gold_utt: I've done one of those before. They are pretty cool. Do you think you will get the job?
I'm not sure. It was a little awkward and stressful.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'll pray for you if that's okay and  then maybe you will get it, but if not, maybe something even better will come along.
Sure, that's ok. And thank you.

first_utt: The other day, my three year old didn't know I was paying attention to her while she was playing with the dog. I overheard her trying to teach the dog how to count to ten.
target_utt: Indeed you are I am proud of her as well.
middle_utt: That is so cute! I bet you were so proud. I bet she will do great in school.
I hope so. She is a good kid. I just hope she doesn't get into trouble.
I'm sure she won't. She sounds like a smart kid.  What kind of dog do you have?
I have a labrador retriever. I love him so much. He is my best friend.
gold_utt: That is amazing. She is a very smart girl.
Yes, I thought that was pretty good for a three year old. When I asked her about it she said they were playing school. Haha.
You must be proud of her. That is a lucky dog, a bark for each count. Haha.
I'm very proud of her.

first_utt: I'm gonna need your support here, because I'm going through something a little bit rough, okay?
target_utt: LOL I don't think so. I think you'll be fine, maybe you were just extra tired.
middle_utt: Yeah, I think so too. I'm just so tired. I've been working so hard.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you feel better soon.   I'm here for you if you need someone to talk to.
Thank you so much. I really appreciate that. It means a lot to me to know that you're there for me.
You're welcome. I know how hard it is to go through something like that.  I hope things get better for you.
gold_utt: Anything you need!! I'm here for you!
I'm 29 years old and I woke up to find that I'd wet the bed last night. I'm...not even sure how. I didn't drink a whole lot before bed or anything.
Don't sweat it, it happened to me in my mid 20's also. Couldn't even tell ya how or why, just that it did.
Should I see a therapist or anything? Is this indicative of some deep-seated problem that I'm not aware of?

first_utt: I enjoy visiting the nursing home on occasion.
target_utt: haha same here!
middle_utt: I do too.  It's so peaceful.  I love the quiet and solitude.
Yes, it is very peaceful and quiet. I like that it is not crowded.
I agree.  There's nothing like a quiet and peaceful place to unwind after a long day of work.
Yes, and it is nice to be able to get away from the stress of the day.
Yes, that's true.  Sometimes I wish I could just take a break from work and go for a walk in the park.
I know what you mean.  Walking is a great way to clear your head.
gold_utt: Oh yeah?  Do you know someone that lives there?
Not really, I take my daughter to see them, so many of them have no visitors at all.
Yeah.  That's awesome that you do that though.  Makes for some special moments with your daughter and teaches her stuff.
She likes to bake, so we take them what she makes :)
That sounds cool!  I bet she cooks good!
She is pretty good for an eleven year old, better than I was.

first_utt: I found some old Christmas cards the other day and had a lovely time reading them and reminiscing about the people who sent them.
target_utt: Lol. Me too!!
middle_utt: That's awesome! I love finding old things like that. It makes me feel nostalgic.
Me too! I was so happy to see them again. I wish I could go back to those days.
I know what you mean. It's hard to believe how far we've come since then.
It really is. I can't believe how fast time goes by. I feel like I'm going to be a grandparent soon.
That's so exciting! I'm sure you'll be a great grandparent. I have two grandchildren and they're the best.
Thank you! I hope so. I'm so excited to be grandparents. I've always wanted to be one.
gold_utt: That must have been nice. I keep cards too.
It was so nice. I'm terrible about throwing cards out. I feel, if someone's taken the time to write, I should preserve it. Does that sound silly?
Of course not. There is so much paper in this house. I keep cards, photos, school projects. Everything. We arent here forever
That's very true. My Dad kept everything too. When he passed we had quite a task sorting through things. I think my brother's still at it!
I found lots of things to pass down when my grandmother passed. I think they passed down their hoarding to us lol
I believe you are right! My family are going to go nuts when they see what they've got to deal with, lol.

first_utt: I'm teaching my daughter how to drive, and so far, so good!
target_utt: It will definitely paid off and I am rooting for her.
middle_utt: That's great! I'm sure she'll do great.  I know I did when I was her age.
I hope so. She's been practicing for a long time. I'm so proud of her!
That's awesome.  She's going to be a great driver one day.  What kind of car does she want to drive?
She wants to drive a Toyota Corolla. I think that's what I'll get her.
That's a good choice.  They're very reliable cars.  You'll be happy with it.
I think so too. It's a nice car. I just hope she doesn't get into any accidents.
gold_utt: That is wonderful, I imagine she is very excited.
She is!  At first, though, she was very nervous.  I told her we could start off slow - her dad lives 1 mile from me down a quiet road, so we started driving back and forth between the two houses.
Okay i see well, take your time she will be getting her liscense soon
Hopefully by the first of the year.  We've worked up to driving to the dollar store 5 miles away.  She's still a little nervous but she's getting better and more confident the more we practice.
She just needs to get her confidence and I am sure you are a great teacher.
I do what I can where I can.  Can't wait for our hard work to pay off and she gets her license!

first_utt: My brother and I recently had to sell a house and he dealt with everything. I'm so lucky to have a brother I can rely on and who I know won't try and con me.
target_utt: I will work on it with my family.
middle_utt: I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm glad you have someone to rely on. I hope everything works out for you.
Thank you, I appreciate that. I am sure things will work out for the both of us.
I'm sure it will. I wish you the best of luck. :)   Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm going to the beach. I love the water. How about you? Any plans?
I am going to a concert with my friends. I have never been to a beach before.
That sounds like a lot of fun. What kind of concert is it?  I've never been either.
gold_utt: Thats neat. Do you guys make a lot of money?
We did and he was so precise with who got what and made sure he sent me my share quickly. He's such a neat brother in so many regards. I always know he'll be there for anyone who needs help.
I wish my siblings were like that. We should be more supportive and close like that
We weren't always close. When we were kids we were always fighting. It wasn't until we got older that we got closer. We're best of friends now.
I am jealous lol
Don't be! There are many, many types of relationships and I don't think ours is necessarily typical. It's just the way it is :)

first_utt: I was over here in the US when my Grandma passed in Scotland. I was so upset - nobody could get hold of me to tell me and her funeral was over before I knew about it.
target_utt: Wow. She probably couldve kept going for years if it wasnt for that.
middle_utt: I'm so sorry to hear that. It's so hard to lose someone so close to you.
It really is. She was my best friend and I miss her so much.  I hope you're doing okay.
I'm doing a lot better now, thank you. I'm sorry for your loss as well.
Thank you. It was a long time ago, but it still stings. I still miss her.
I know how you feel. My grandmother passed away a few years ago and I still think about her.
I'm so sorry to hear that. It's so hard when you lose a loved one.
gold_utt: Thats sad. Have you been to Scotand since?
Only for funerals, unfortunately. Both my parents have since died. Unpleasant fact of life, I'm afraid.
Im sorry to hear that. Were you born there?
Yes I was. I didn't come to the US until I was in my 30s. Didn't expect my Grandma to pass the minute I got here, but she was 96, so it shouldn't have been such a surprise!
96! Wow. Thats a full life!
She was as fit as a flea too. She tripped and broke her hip and got a bad infection in the hospital. That's what she died of!

first_utt: I really love my life right now.
target_utt: and I can stay in my PJs all day long!
middle_utt: That's great! What do you like to do in your free time? I like to play video games.
I love to read books and watch movies. What kind of video games do you play?
I play a lot of Call of Duty. It's my favorite game of all time.
That's cool. I've never played it. I'm more of a Mario Kart fan.
gold_utt: Thats really good to hear.  Whats going on?
Nothing really! I just love that I can work at home and have time to clean or cook whenever I want.
I work from home too.  Its so nice to be able to do laundry and things on my breaks.  Im so productive around the house
Right? And no having to interact with others unless we choose too.

first_utt: It was bad and ontop of it they refused to admit their mistake
target_utt: No problem! I hope so too. Good luck with that!
middle_utt: Yeah, I'm not going to lie, I was a little upset about it, but I'm glad they were honest about it.
I am glad you were honest with them too. It's always good to be honest.
Yeah, it's always nice to have honest people in your life. I wish more people were like that.
I agree. It is hard to find honest people these days. I am thankful to have them in my life.
gold_utt: Oh no, what happened?
placed an order online and the appliance place didnt have it, so they gave me something else without telling me
Oh, that's odd! I'm sorry they didn't tell you what was going on.
Thanks for hearing me out. I filed a complaint at the council. I hope they listen

first_utt: Hello ... I give thanks for the good things and the things that do not, the good things make me feel good and the satisfaction and the bad things are internal growth
target_utt: i would totally attempt it
middle_utt: That's a good way to look at it.  I think I'll try it out.
I hope it works out for you.  It's always good to try new things.
Thanks, I hope so too. I think it will be a good experience for me.
I hope you have a great time!  I'm sure you'll do great!
Thank you so much! I really hope so. I'm going to try my best.
You're very welcome.  Good luck and I hope everything goes well for you!  :)
gold_utt: that is a very optimistic way to look at life . i should actually look at life that way too instead of getting overwhelmed when things do not go my way
For me it was a hard learning ... but after many blows ... I assimilated it
how long have you looked at life this way? is it sustainable ?
for a year ... you assimilate it when you realize that you are responsible ... neither the people nor the circumstances are responsible
this is completely true. it involves totally re conditioning the mind .
condition the mind and spirit

first_utt: I'm looking forward to my niece arriving from Washington. I haven't seen her in 2 years!
target_utt: I am a baby delivering doctor!
middle_utt: Wow, that's a long time. How far away is she from you? I bet she's going to be so excited to see you!
She's about 2.5 hours away. I can't wait to see her. I miss her so much.
That's so exciting! I bet you're going to have a great time with her.
Thank you! I hope so. She's my best friend and I've known her since she was a baby.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time together. I wish you the best of luck!
Thank you so much! I really appreciate it. I hope everything goes well for you as well.
gold_utt: Do you have some big plans for the visit?
Probably not, because she is 6 months pregnant. Her husband is in the military and is away, so she will be here when she has her baby.
Uh oh, have you ever delivered a baby before?
Oh no! And I don't plan on it! I'll leave that to the doctors!
Oh right, I am a doctor.
Oh cool! What kind of doctor?

first_utt: I can still look back with shame at the way I treated a girl in sixth grade. I wasn't as bad as others, but that doesn't make me feel any better.
target_utt: Wow, so your going to take being a bad person to the grave. Maybe you'll see her in the next life?
middle_utt: I don't think I will ever be able to forgive myself for what I did.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you can learn from your mistakes and move on.
Thank you, I appreciate that. It was a long time ago, but I still feel bad about it.
Don't feel too bad. We all make mistakes. I'm sure you learned from it.
gold_utt: Where you not secure in your self?
Well, like a lot of 6th graders I was aware of *not* wanting to be an outcast for any reason. And unfortunately, she was. As an adult of course, my heart squeezes for *all* the kids we were!
You can track her down to say sorry, or would that be creepy?
Unfortunately, she died. I only found out when Facebook first came out, and her brother and I "friended" one another.

first_utt: I am always suffering due to lack of money and I wish I could be rich someday
target_utt: That is so true. But to lead a happy life, money is necessary to some extent.
middle_utt: I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you can find a way to make it happen.
I hope so too, but I am not sure if I will ever be able to.
I'm sure you will. Just keep working hard and you'll get there..
Thank you for the kind words. I will try my best. I wish you the best as well.
Thank you so much. I really appreciate it. I'll do my best to help.
gold_utt: I am in the same boat, but I think that I can still be very happy and very content with the little bit of money or lack of I have.
That's good to know. No wonder we are here doing these tasks
How funny! I know how you feel though. I have always been poor.
ME TOO. MY Parents have always suffered and so have I. It is so unfair
Happiness is within and I seek that all the time. Even rich people are sad and unhappy.

first_utt: I was really down after I found out that I was not going to be able to move.
target_utt: Yeah. Do you have back up plans for this issue?
middle_utt: I do, but it's going to take a lot of time and money. I'm not sure if I'm going to make it.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope everything works out for you. I know how hard it can be.
Thank you, I appreciate it. I think I'm just going to have to keep trying.
I'm sure you will. I wish you the best of luck. I'll be thinking of you.
gold_utt: Why? How did that happen?
Becaue I am stuck at a mine site and no one will buy me out. No one wants to live at a mine site with land collapsing everywhere.
That's so sad. I feel sorry for you.
I feel sorry for me too!

first_utt: I'm currently working for someone that is *such* a great example of a leader! It makes going into work inspiring every day / every way.
target_utt: Well I've been in the business all my life and have worked for some great people. So I pull from what I learned from them.
middle_utt: That's great! What do you do for a living? I'm a teacher. I love my job.
I work for a company that provides online services. It's a lot of fun!
That sounds like a great job! I bet you get to meet lots of interesting people.
I do! I've met some really interesting people over the years. I also get to work from home which is great.
gold_utt: Lucky you! That is rare. Maybe one day people will think of you like that?

That's a very kind statement, and certainly what I would strive for. And it's the rarity that *inspires* me. That should be the norm, not the exception! THAT'S what I'd like to inspire in people. How about you?
I have something totally different. My boss is clueless to the world and have no business being a leader.
That is soul-sapping. What do you do to inspire yourself, and not let that kind of behavior drag you down?

first_utt: Running my first (and maybe only!) marathon felt like *such* a huge accomplishment!
target_utt: Oh, wow.  Not only to be able to do all the running but to view the scenery!
middle_utt: It really was.  I was so proud of myself.  It took me a long time to get to that point.
I bet it did!  Did you have a lot of training ahead of you, or did you just do it on your own?
I just did it on my own.  But it was still a great accomplishment.
I'm sure it was!  It's great that you were able to accomplish something like that.  You should be proud of yourself!
gold_utt: Wow, that is an amazing accomplishment!  Congratulations!  You gotta be feeling like you're on top of the world after that!
Ah, it was the best! Plus it helped that I purposely chose an amazing destination in which to run it -- it was the Venice Marathon!
My first thought was "California" but then there's Venice [Italy] and then either way, that's an amazing destination!
We were living overseas at the times -- the most impressive part was crossing the Grand Canal over a pontoon of boats to finish the marathon ;-)

first_utt: I didn't force her into anything. She seemed to know what she was doing anyway
target_utt: Seriously what the hell are you talking about??
middle_utt: I know, right?  I was so mad.  I don't know what I would have done if I was in your shoes.
I know right? I was furious. She was just so rude and obnoxious.
I know.  She was so rude.  It was like she was trying to be rude to me.
I know! I was like "WHAT!?" and she was just standing there like nothing was going on.
gold_utt: Wow back up there friend, what are you talking about?
I wish it never happened now.
Context, what the heck are you talking about?
she was 8

first_utt: I never liked milk growing up, because my family drank skim.
target_utt: That's great.  2% is much more healthful than whole milk.
middle_utt: I agree, whole milk is so much better for you.  It's so much more nutritious.
I agree.  I think whole milk has a lot of nutritional value.
I think so too.  There are so many different kinds of milk out there.  So many to choose from.
Yes, there are!  I like almond milk the best, but I also like coconut milk.  What's your favorite?
I really like coca-cola.  Coca-Cola is my favorite soft drink.
Mine too!  It's so good!  Do you have a favorite kind of soft drink?
gold_utt: Do you like it now?
Well, first I tried whole milk, and that was gross. But I just tried 2% milk, and I like it!
I like 2% as well.  It's perfect for cereal and chocolate milk!
I agree! I'm so happy I can enjoy it now.
Have you tried 1%?
No, but I am satisfied with my choice.

first_utt: it was brutal
target_utt: ok. I understand
middle_utt: It was. I was so mad at myself. I should have been more careful. I am so ashamed of myself.
Don't be so hard on yourself. It happens to the best of us. I'm sure you learned from it.
I sure did. I will never make that mistake again. It was so embarrassing.
I'm glad you're able to look at it from the perspective of it. It's a learning experience for sure.
gold_utt: What was brutal?
i didnt shower for a few days and had an important meeting. I could tell that they could smell me. I became a tomato.
Really? No shower for few days?
yes. homeless for a bit

first_utt: how was your day?
target_utt: Too hot for anything
middle_utt: My day was great! I got to go to the beach and relax. How was yours?
It was great. I went to the lake and had a great time. I'm glad you had a good day.
Thank you! I am glad you enjoyed your day as well. I hope you have a great rest of your day!
You too! Thanks for the chat. Have a great day!   Bye!
gold_utt: it was fine. How about you?
yeah its an another good day
Nothing special...
oh how was the climate there/

first_utt: I once went to a doc appointment where I literally sat for three hours in the waiting room and then the doc only spent 5 min with me
target_utt: Wow! I would write a review, and choose another doctor who actually cares about his patient!
middle_utt: That's terrible. I'm sorry that happened to you. I hope you found a better doctor.
I did, but it was a long time ago. I was so mad at that doctor.
That's understandable. I would have been too. Hopefully you can find a better one.
I hope so too. I don't think I will ever go back to that doctor again.
gold_utt: Omg! That is terrible. They should really be considerate of people's time
I wouldn't have minded as much if he actually seemed to care.  If they make you wait and then spend alot of time with you that is one thing
Right. Did he at least apologize for the long wait
Oh no he acted like I was bothering him by taking up his time!  It was so annoying!
